Detailed Description

EMIF configuration structure.

This structure provides the configuration settings for the EMIF. A pointer to this structure is passed to the CSL_emifConfig function which performs the proper configuration sequence for the EMIF subsystem, SDRAM controller, and PHY.

This structure provides the configuration settings for the EMIF. A pointer to this structure is passed to the CSL_emifConfig function which performs the proper configuration sequence for the EMIF subsystem.

Field Documentation

bool csl_emif_config_t::bEnableBusECC

[IN] Enable bus ECC

uint32_t csl_emif_config_t::dataTraining

[IN] Specifies the data training operations to be performed. It is a logical-OR of available data training types. See CSL_EmifDataTrainingType for a list of data training types.

CSL_EmifDelayClockCyclesCbFxnPtr csl_emif_config_t::delayClockCyclesCbFxnPtr

[IN] Pointer to a user-provided function that performs a delay of the specified number of clock cycles per the frequency of the specified clock type

uint16_t csl_emif_config_t::memcDramDataWidthBits

[IN] Width (in bits) of the controller's DRAM data bus (64, 32, or 16)

CSL_emif_ctlcfgRegs* csl_emif_config_t::pEmifCtlRegs

[IN] Pointer to Synopsys DDR controller registers

CSL_emif_phycfgRegs* csl_emif_config_t::pEmifPhyRegs

[IN] Pointer to Synopsys PUB registers

CSL_emif_sscfgRegs* csl_emif_config_t::pEmifSsRegs

[IN] Pointer to DDR subsystem registers

CSL_EmifForceMemEccErrorCfg* csl_emif_config_t::pForceMemEccErrorCfg

[IN] Pointer to memory ECC error forcing parameters (NULL if not needed)

CSL_EmifPhyParms* csl_emif_config_t::pPhyParms

[IN] Pointer to PHY initialization parameters (if NULL, defaults are used)

CSL_EmifSdramParms* csl_emif_config_t::pSdramParms

[IN] Pointer to SDRAM parameters (if NULL, defaults are used)

uint16_t csl_emif_config_t::sdramClkFreqMHz

[IN] Frequency (MHz) of clock to SDRAM device

CSL_EmifSdramCtrlCfgCbFxnPtr csl_emif_config_t::sdramCtrlCfgCbFxnPtr

[IN] Pointer to a user-provided function that performs additional Sdram controller configuration (NULL if not needed)

CSL_EmifSdramPhyCfgCbFxnPtr csl_emif_config_t::sdramPhyCfgCbFxnPtr

[IN] Pointer to a user-provided function that performs additional post PHY init configuration (NULL if not needed)
